oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Springfield Daily Republican
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Northern newspaper features report on the surrender of Hartsville, Tennessee. The issue has a six-column format but is unpaginated. Confederate Gen. John Hunt Morgan attacked the Federal garrison on December 7, 1862. Morgan's cavalry, reinforced by an understrength infantry brigade, surprised and overwhelmed the larger Federal force compeling their surrender. The battle of Hartsville was a precursor to the fighting which would erupt twenty-three days later at Stones River.
